title: Grazing Management  NDSU Extension Spring 2021 Horse Management Webinar Series

tasks.task: Attend a webinar on horse grazing management.
subtasks: Learn about different grass types suitable for horse pastures in North Dakota.
Understand the importance of fertilizing pastures and appropriate timing.
Identify toxic plants and trees harmful to horses.
Know best practices for seeding and overseeding horse pastures.
Discuss rotational grazing strategies to manage pasture health and horse nutrition.
Learn about managing weeds and their impact on horse pastures.
Understand the consequences of overgrazing and the proper grazing management techniques.

tasks.task: Familiarize oneself with the signs of toxicity in horses due to consuming toxic plants.
